definition: to give it a try
to test/to try/experiment/examination/test
to test/to try/experiment/examination/test
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: We'd better arrange a try-on with a small order before we place a big order .
sentences.chinese: 我们在下大定单之前，最好安排个小定单试试看。

sentences.english: Try disabling the audio in CCE.
Maybe  you  don't  believe  me, but  try  to go without a water heater for just one day.
sentences.chinese: 也许你不相信我，但试试看没有热水器过一天。

sentences.english: You can try it right now.
Liz suggested (that) I try the shop on Mill Road.
sentences.chinese: 莉斯建议我到米尔路的商店试试看。

sentences.english: Let me try it. we will see .
sentences.chinese: 我来试试看看，成败在此一举。

sentences.english: MeiLin: You should try out for the school.
I can't help but agree with you there.
sentences.chinese: 他留下个活话，说能不能帮上忙试试看。

sentences.english: Try a graham cracker or bowl of cereal.
sentences.chinese: 试试看全麦饼干或者一碗麦片。

sentences.english: Transfer the game to internal HDD and try again.
sentences.chinese: 把游戏灌到内置硬碟再重新运行试试看。

sentences.english: Try it—there are so many cases when both words will get past Spellchecker.
sentences.chinese: 试试看，还有很多这样迷惑校对者的例子。

sentences.english: I'll have a try, it's neck or nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我来试试看，成败在此一举。

sentences.english: Try and see whether you can get their support.
sentences.chinese: 你试试看，能否得到他们的支持。

sentences.english: CASEY : Without your little exorcism book? Hey, go ahead.
sentences.chinese: 不用你的小趋魔书？呵，你尽管试试看。

definition: to have a try
(coll.) to try to
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1

definition: to have a look
there is no harm in/might as well
next time
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
(onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm
next chapter/next time
otherwise/or else/how about...?/either... (or...)
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
it doesn't matter
can't say for sure/maybe
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
